mapper.select: SELECT FORM_SEQ, APP_DATE, COURSECODE, COURSENAME, STM, START_DATE 결석시작일 FROM APP_FORM JOIN IS_APPROVE USING(FORM_SEQ) JOIN COURSE USING(COURSECODE) WHERE STUDENT_ID = #{id} AND IS_APPROVE.STM = #{stm} ORDER BY FORM_SEQ DESC
SELECT APP_DATE, COURSENAME, REASON, START_DATE, ABSENT_DAYS, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, STM FROM APP_FORM A JOIN IS_APPROVE I USING(FORM_SEQ) JOIN COURSE USING(COURSECODE) WHERE FORM_SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT SIGNATURE.NEWFILENAME FROM SIGNATURE JOIN APP_FORM ON APP_FORM.RECIPIENT_ID = SIGNATURE.SIGNATURE_ID JOIN IS_APPROVE ON IS_APPROVE.FORM_SEQ = APP_FORM.FORM_SEQ WHERE SIGNATURE.SIGNATURE_ID = #{id} AND APP_FORM.FORM_SEQ = #{seq} AND IS_APPROVE.STM = #{stm}

SELECT A.FORM_SEQ, APP_DATE, A.REASON, START_DATE, ABSENT_DAYS, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, STM, U.REASON AS UNAPPROVED_REASON FROM APP_FORM A JOIN IS_APPROVE I ON A.FORM_SEQ = I.FORM_SEQ JOIN UNAPPROVED U ON I.FORM_SEQ = U.FORM_SEQ WHERE A.FORM_SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT A.APP_DATE, I.STM, S.NAME, A.FORM_SEQ, (SELECT COURSENAME FROM COURSE WHERE COURSECODE = A.COURSECODE) AS COURSENAME FROM APP_FORM A JOIN IS_APPROVE I ON A.FORM_SEQ = I.FORM_SEQ JOIN STUDENT S ON A.STUDENT_ID = S.ID WHERE A.RECIPIENT_ID = #{id} AND I.STM = #{stm} ORDER BY A.FORM_SEQ DESC
SELECT COURSE.ID, COURSENAME, COURSECODE, STARTDATE FROM USERCOURSE JOIN COURSE USING(COURSECODE) WHERE USERCOURSE.ID = #{id} ORDER BY COURSENAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APP_FORM (FORM_SEQ, APP_DATE, STUDENT_ID, RECIPIENT_ID , --관리자ID COURSECODE, REASON, START_DATE, ABSENT_DAYS, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME) --과정ID VALUES (APP_FORM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{id}, #{recipient_id}, #{coursecode}, #{reason}, #{start_date}, #{ABSENT_DAYS}, #{filename}, #{newfilename})
INSERT INTO IS_APPROVE(FORM_SEQ, STM) VALUES((SELECT MAX(FORM_SEQ) FROM APP_FORM WHERE STUDENT_ID=#{id}), 'N')
